Hablemos de localización en Laravel, cré: Let’s talk about Localization in Laravel, trust me, it’s an awesome topic. Notwithstanding, not many have come to realize this awesomeness.
La localización de acuerdo con el diccio: Localization according to the dictionary, means adapting something to a fixed position or location. It therefore suffices to say that Laravel localization involves adapting the language used in the app to the given location of the user.
Un sitio multilíngüe puede parecer algo: A multilingual site may seem complicated. However, there are several packages for Laravel that greatly simplify our work to allow us to put into operation a multilingual site in a matter of minutes.
